branchCategory.name: Bar Ionizers
branchCategory.description: <p>By neutralizing static electricity, our IZS bar style Ionizer prevents damage to work pieces caused by sticking. Static charge removal time can be reduced with an optional sensor that directly senses charge &nbsp;allowing the removal of static electricity at high speed (0.3s) by generating the appropriate ion polarity. Needle cartridges can be replaced quickly to reduce down time. The IZS bar style Ionizer is available &nbsp;in various lengths to meet the specific needs of your work area.</p>

branchItem.name: IZS40/41/42, Bar Type Ionizer (Standard, Feedback Sensor and Dual AC Types)
branchItem.description: <P>The IZS4 family is SMC's 3rd generation of bar ionizers. Bar ionizers generate a curtain of static eliminating ions effective for a distance up to 2000mm / 6.5 ft. The family includes the standard IZS40 model, the IZS41 with feedback or auto balance sensor and rapid static neutralization, and the IZS42 with low amplitude ion generation for sensitive electronics. The IZS41 and 42 are remote control capable, and can be linked via cable for operation from a single power supply. Needle cartridges are easily removed without tools for cleaning or end-of-life replacement. </P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Choose from 3 models to best fit your application and price point <LI>High speed or energy saving cartridges in tungsten or single crystal silicon <LI>Operation panel features multiple setting controls and diagnostic LEDs <LI>2 models available with auto balance or feedback sensor for optimizing ion generation <LI>2 models with remote control capability <LI>32 available lengths, up to 2500mm / 8.2 ft long </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: IZS31, Bar Type Ionizer w/Feedback or Auto balance Sensor
branchItem.description: <P>The IZS31 is SMC's 2nd generation bar ionizer. Bar ionizers generate a curtain of static eliminating ions effective for a distance up to 2000mm / 6.5 ft. The IZS31 can be operated with feedback sensor for the most rapid static elimination, or the auto balance sensor for a neutral environment with high accuracy. 3 different run modes available to tailor ion generation to a range of static conditions. Needle cartridges are easily removed without tools for cleaning or end-of-life replacement. </P>

branchItem.name: IZS, Electrode Cartridges
branchItem.description: <p> Replacement electrode cartridges for Series IZS bar ionizers. Cartridge types include both high speed and energy saving. Materials: tungsten, silicon, stainless steel.</p>

branchItem.name: IZT40/41/42, Bar Type Ionizer, Separate Controller and Power Supply Module
branchItem.description: <p>The IZT bar ionizer is an industrial static control solution.  Bar ionizers generate a curtain of static eliminating ions effective for a distance up to 2000mm/6.5 ft.  The IZT's low profile is also ideal for tight clearance installations.  Compared to SMC's IZS4 bar ionizers, the power supply and control modules have been separated from the bar, resulting in a reduction in bar height.  IZT bars can be placed closer to static-carriying materials in more confined adjacent spaces.  The separate controller can be mounted in a workstation for easier access and observation during operation.  Models include the standard IZT40, the IZT41 which adds auto-balance, emitter maintenance detection, and I/O signals, and the IZT42 with low amplitude ion generation for sensitive electronics.  Extending the value of IZT, one controller can manage a maximum of 4 ionizing bars.  Needle cartridges are easily removed, without tools, for cleaning or end-of-life replacement, futher extending this ionizer's value.</p>

branchItem.name: IZTB, Bar Ionizer
branchItem.description: <p>The IZTB bar ionizer is the ion emitting component of the IZT static control system.  This component is available for individual configuration as an additional bar to existing 1-bar system, or as a replacement.  A complete system consists of 1 to 4 bars, a single controller, and a power supply module for each bar, plus cables and accessories as required.  These components can also be ordered separately.</p>

branchItem.name: IZTP, High-voltage Power Supply Module
branchItem.description: <p>The IZTP power supply module is the high-voltage source component for the IZT static control system.  This component is available for individual selection as an additional module to an existing 1-bar system, or as a replacement.  A complete system consists of 1 to 4 bars, a single controller, and a power supply module for each bar, plus cables and accessories are required.  These components can also be ordered separately.</p>

branchItem.name: IZTC, Controller
branchItem.description: <p>The IZTC controller is the operating component for the IZT static control system.  This component is available for individual selection as a replacement or to upgrade a system from standard to AC type.  A complete system consists of 1 to 4 bars, a single controller, and a power supply module for each bar, plus cables and accessories as requied.  These components can also be ordered separately.</p>
